name: @camunda/camunda-docs-modeler-screenshots
description: Update the docs screenshots of the Camunda Modeler

scripts.pull:modeler: git -C camunda-modeler pull || git clone git@github.com:camunda/camunda-modeler.git camunda-modeler
scripts.pull:docs-manual: git -C camunda-docs-manual pull || git clone git@github.com:camunda/camunda-docs-manual.git camunda-docs-manual
scripts.pull:docs-static: git -C camunda-docs-static pull || git clone git@github.com:camunda/camunda-docs-static.git camunda-docs-static
scripts.build:modeler: (cd camunda-modeler && npm i && npm run build)
scripts.start: run-s lint pull build:modeler test screenshots

author: Max Trumpf (https://github.com/MaxTru)
